title: The Invitation
description: My name is Sophie. I’m a scullery maid in the household of the Fournier’s. I moved to Paris last year from my father’s farm some 30 miles outside of the city. I watch Helene everyday and all I want is to be her. She’s the most famous of the King’s courtesans and I daydream about the kind of life she must lead.Madam M. found me standing by the King’s coach and offered me a chance to be something more than just a maid. But first, I must go to an address and pass some sort of test. I can’t wait to try.The Invitation is a ~6,500 word erotic historical romance short story featuring graphic scorching sex, voyeurism, and M/F and F/F. It is the first in the series.Please THIS IS NOT A NOVEL. This is a serial miniseries. This and its subsequent (9) parts will be compiled into three omnibuses, Act 1, Act 2 and Act 3, if you prefer to wait for these compilations instead.
author: M.A. Margeaux
